001/**
002 * This is the login page controller 
003 * @author Sarah Higdon
004 */
005package src.controller;
006
007import javafx.fxml.FXML;
008import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
009import javafx.scene.Parent;
010import javafx.scene.Scene;
011import javafx.scene.image.ImageView;
012import javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent;
013import javafx.stage.Stage;
014import src.controller.useful_functions.user_role;
015import javafx.scene.Node;
016
017import static src.controller.useful_functions.current_user_role;
018import static src.controller.useful_functions.switch_scene;
019
020import java.io.File;
021import java.io.IOException;
022// if this all is highlighted red its okay because vscode cant see JavaFX at compile time
023// this is what the launch.json file is for in the .vscode folder
024    //this is resolved at runtime
025/**
026 * This class provides backend for the functionality of the login page
027 */
028public class login_page_controller {
029
030    @FXML
031    private ImageView manager_button;
032
033    @FXML
034    private ImageView cashier_button;
035
036    /**
037     * This function opens the manger GUI when manager button is clicked
038     * @param event - Manager button getting clicker
039     */
040    @FXML
041    private void handle_manager_click(MouseEvent event) {
042        current_user_role = user_role.MANAGER;
043        System.out.println("user role set to MANAGER");
044        //this function comes from useful_functions.java
045        switch_scene("GUI/manager_view.fxml", event);
046    }
047
048    /**
049     * This function opens the cashier GUI when cashier button is clicked
050     * @param event - Cashier button getting clicker
051     */
052    @FXML
053    private void handle_cashier_click(MouseEvent event) {
054        current_user_role = user_role.CASHIER;
055        System.out.println("user role set to CASHIER");
056        switch_scene("GUI/order_page.fxml", event);
057    }
058
059    /**
060     * This function just prints out a message to console to say eveything loaded correctly
061     */
062    @FXML
063    public void initialize() {
064        //can delete this method if not needed
065        System.out.println("Login page loaded successfully!");
066    }
067
068
069}
